ygData.subject: Nuance (sp?).....
ygData.msgSnippet: I looked up the Illusion Iksar quest and the scroll is no longer no drop. That being the case, if I ever get the other 2 pieces for it (the powder and the
ygData.messageBody:
I looked up the Illusion Iksar quest and the scroll is no longer no drop.
That being the case, if I ever get the other 2 pieces for it (the powder and
the tiger skin) I will complete the quest and get you the scroll.
I was ambushed by 4 ton warriors while at the iksar brigand camp in the
Swamp of No Hope last night. The 2nd one dropped the totem. =) I was also
ambushed by a Froglok Vis Shaman. He dropped a "Wing of Xegony" that looks
like a BIM with a number in the bottom right. Anyone know what this is for?

Thanks.

--
Arakine
Fennin
--
Andon
Terris-Thule
